flexipdf_knowledge.pdf_to_word: Convert PDF files into editable Word (.docx) documents.
flexipdf_knowledge.word_to_pdf: Convert Word (.docx) files into clean, printable PDF files.
flexipdf_knowledge.pdf_to_image: Export pages of a PDF into high-quality image files (PNG/JPG).
flexipdf_knowledge.images_to_pdf: Merge multiple images into a single PDF document.
flexipdf_knowledge.merge_pdfs: Combine multiple PDF files into a single PDF.
flexipdf_knowledge.split_pdf: Split a PDF into multiple smaller PDF files by page ranges.
flexipdf_knowledge.compress_pdf: Reduce PDF file size while keeping acceptable quality.
flexipdf_knowledge.ocr_pdf: (If available) Use OCR to recognize text inside scanned PDF pages.
flexipdf_knowledge.ai_assistant: Iâ€™m Ali â€” the built-in AI assistant that helps with FlexiPDF tasks and answers questions.
